TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersistChildrenAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersistChildrenAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersistChildrenAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义一个特性，该特性由 ASP.NET 服务器控件用于指示在设计时服务器控件中包含的嵌套内容是与控件对应，还是与服务器控件的属性对应。

span.span: Defines an attribute that is used by ASP.NET server controls to indicate at design time whether nested content that is contained within a server control corresponds to controls or to properties of the server control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与结合使用来确定如何嵌套的控件的内容将被解释。The is used in combination with the to determine how nested content of a control is interpreted. 如果是`true`和是`false`，包含 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的嵌套的内容保存为控件。If is `true` and is `false`, the nested content contained within an ASP.NET server control is persisted as controls. 如果是`false`和是`true`，嵌套的内容保存为服务器控件的属性。If is `false` and is `true`, the nested content is persisted as properties of the server control. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 本部分中的代码示例包含两个部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置自定义控件元数据，以便在设计时，其嵌套的内容保存为控件的属性。The first code example demonstrates how to set the metadata of a custom control so that at design time, its nested content is persisted as properties of the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页中的类。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下面的代码示例演示如何应用属性，以便无自定义服务器控件的嵌套控件将保留为嵌套的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute so that none of a custom server control's nested controls are persisted as nested controls. 名为的自定义服务器控件`CollectionPropertyControl`具有属性设置为`false`以便`Employee`，添加的对象将保留为嵌套元素。The custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl` has the attribute set to `false` so that the `Employee` objects that are added are persisted as nested elements. [!code-csharp[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/CS/persistchildren_1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/VB/persistchildren_1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 页中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. [!code-aspx-csharp[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/CS/persistchildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/VB/persistchildren.aspx#3)]

span.span: Indicates the default attribute state.
The field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为字段是`Yes`，，该值指示嵌套的内容在设计时保留。The default value for the field is `Yes`, indicating that nested content is persisted at design time.

Public Shared ReadOnly No As PersistChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 指示在设计时嵌套内容不应作为嵌套控件保留。

span.span: Indicates that nested content should not persist as nested controls at design time.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字段被调用时，服务器控件的内部的内容将保持为不是服务器的属性。If the field is called, the inner content of a server control is persisted as properties, not as server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要配置的自定义暂留的嵌套的内容时，使用采用重载`usesCustomPersistence`参数。To configure nested content for custom persistence, use the overload that takes a `usesCustomPersistence` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the value of the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 指示在设计时嵌套内容应作为控件保留。

span.span: Indicates that nested content should persist as controls at design time.
The field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字段被调用时，嵌套的内容将保持为控件。If the field is called, nested content is persisted as controls.
